component.text:
Activity - Cable Pinouts

Correctly align the wire colors to build a TIA/EIA-568A cable pinout.

Drag each wire color to its correct placement on the RJ-45 image in the graphic.
Bottom view of an RJ-45 connector
You have successfully chosen the correct T-568A cable pinout.
You have not successfully chosen the correct T-568A cable pinout.

Activity - Cable Pinouts

Correctly align the wire colors to build a TIA/EIA-568B cable pinout.

Drag each wire color to its correct placement on the RJ-45 image in the graphic.
Bottom view of an RJ-45 connector
You have successfully chosen the correct T-568B cable pinout.
You have not successfully chosen the correct T-568B cable pinout.
